districts.name: Asokoro
districts.description: Asokoro is a district located in Phase 1 of Abuja. It is known for its high-end residential areas and the Aso Rock Presidential Complex.

districts.name: Central Area
districts.description: The Central Area is the commercial and administrative heart of Abuja, situated in Phase 1. It houses government offices, financial institutions, and cultural landmarks.

districts.name: Garki
districts.description: Garki is a central district in Phase 1 of Abuja. It is known for its commercial and residential areas, as well as government offices and embassies.

districts.name: Guzape

districts.name: Maitama
districts.description: Maitama is an upscale residential and diplomatic district in Phase 1. It is home to many embassies, high-end residences, and diplomatic missions.

districts.name: Wuse
districts.description: Wuse is a bustling district in Phase 1, characterized by shopping malls, markets, and entertainment centers. It is a major commercial hub.
